If the category doesn't have a budget entry
categoryExp[category]={budget:0,expenses:expense};}categoryExp[category].expenses=categoryExp[category].expenses+expense;});let temp;for(const[key,value]of Distribution by Category'}}};const monthLabels=["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"];let totalExpenseByMonth=[];let lineChartData={};const
